tasks.label: docker-compose up affected services
tasks.command: docker-compose up -d mytb http_server ollama nl2sparql

tasks.label: Rebuild api and visualiser for health endpoints
tasks.command: docker-compose build api visualiser microservices && docker-compose up -d api visualiser microservices

tasks.label: Generate sensor lookup from sensor_list.txt
args: $src = 'rasa-bldg2/actions/sensor_list.txt'; $dst = 'rasa-bldg2/data/lookup/sensor_type.md'; if (Test-Path $src) { Get-Content $src | ForEach-Object { if($_ -and -not $_.StartsWith('#')) { $_.Trim() } } | Set-Content -Encoding UTF8 $dst } else { Write-Error "Missing $src" }

tasks.label: Rasa validate training data
tasks.command: docker compose run --rm --no-deps rasa data validate -v
